message.body: We have to talk. I'm already broken hearted about tim. Gawd. Also, NYC? Lots to discuss!
Yes we DO need to talk! I'm starting new, had a good heart to heart with griggs and meeting a boy at the ballet tonight. Why are you broken hearted? We are too
Alike - did your fantasies of being with him get you ahead of yourself?
No we talked last night and I realized how much I like him
